channel.title: Current worn Equipment and Items Kept on Death
channel.description:
My server's Base is Blurr's.
[URL=http://img7.imageshack.us/i/equipbug.jpg/][IMG]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/2431/equipbug.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img7/equipbug.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img7.imageshack.us/img7/equipbug.jpg/1/w640.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://img11.imageshack.us/i/equipiconanddeathicon.jpg/][IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/4465/equipiconanddeathicon.jpg[/img][/URL] [URL=http://g.imageshack.us/img11/equipiconanddeathicon.jpg/1/][IMG]http://img11.imageshack.us/img11/equipiconanddeathicon.jpg/1/w236.png[/img][/URL]
When I click on the "Items Kept on Death" tab, it disconnects me.
If anyone can tell me the code for these two things, and where to find them.. It would be very appreciated!
Thanks, Aleksander.

item.title: Current worn Equipment and Items Kept on Death

item.description:

If anyone can tell me the code for these two things, and where to find them… It would be very appreciated!
